name: [O] Paranormal Relativity
description:
Your mission is to get the mysterious artifact and get back to the spaceship before You run out of air.

Credits:

- [O] Oskar Kołosowski (Cekol93) - programming, game design, graphics

- [O] Adam Prucnal (segre) - music, sound design

This game is made for Huuuge Game Jam 2016.
